data.message: i don't know who screwed up face book but i wish they would bring it back where we know where all our info is with out woundering where it s at

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Michael.  We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Rhea
the main problem is i have a bad memery and i can't remember where stuff is i need my old account like i had it to get by with my daily things i am by the way 76 years old
Face book i have nearly 1800 disabled friends r maybe deactivated how to unfriend them i even cant see them
yes you can return my account the way it was so i can gradually change to what facebook is trrying to do

Hey, Elham. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2lRlm6p. -Rhea
